column6: Ares and his men enter a suicide standoff! The God of War exposed his hand-picked H.A.M.M.E.R. cadets to intensive, real-world training in the field...by going up against a dark and deadly force from his distant past. But Ares got a deadly heap more than he bargained for, and his trainees are about to get schooled the hard way! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Manuel Garcia | penciller:Ed McGuinness | inker:Stefano Gaudiano | inker:Dexter Vines | writer:Kieron Gillen | colorist:Morry Hollowell
